effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 718,914 over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 288,636.
Set: Divine Toll applies Insurance! to allies it heals for 8 sec. Divine Toll's cooldown is reduced by 1.0 sec each time you spend Holy Power.

sockets.display_string: +159 Primary Stat and +2% Movement Speed per unique Algari gem color

name: Vile Vial of Kaheti Bile

spells.description: Equip: Your healing spells and abilities have a chance to cause the vial to maliciously launch itself onto your lowest health ally, healing them for 303,268.

description: The vial shimmers, brought to life by forgotten magics. Its intent, to harm. Its contents, a potent curative.

spells.description: Use: Channel to store 50,429 mana in the Ingenious Mana Battery, up to a max of 201,715. (1 Min Cooldown)

Equip: While your mana is above 50%, gain 826 Versatility, increased by up to 100% by the mana stored in the battery. While your mana is under 50%, siphon 50,429 mana every 5 sec from the Ingenious Mana Battery into your mana pool.
Equip: Your attacks have a very high chance to contaminate your target with industrial runoff up to 25 times, dealing 1,117 Shadow damage per stack every 3 sec until their demise.
Equip: Your gear warms with Woven Dawnthread and gains 756 Critical Strike when over 80% health.
